code:
export const projects = [{
  id: 'nudge',
  title: 'Nudging toward healthy financial behaviors',
  problem: 'The client loses $40m / year because many of its customers are late on their bills, and aren\'t sure why',
  method: 'Ethnographic interviews (w/customers & client retail employees), mixed-methods research (collaboration w/ quant team), sacrificial concepting.',
  solution: 'A detailed taxonomy of late payers, including why they\'re late, nudges they respond best to, and how to find target them in customer database.',
  outcome: 'We designed 3 targeted "nudge-experiments" to test live on client platform with metrics to evaluate success.',
  image: '/src/assets/images/nudge.jpg',
  imageAlt: 'four people in a living room sitting in a circle talking',
  externalLink: 'https://www.dropbox.com/s/l6p7sezsbapy74r/2%20-%20Late%20Payers.pdf?dl=0',
  externalLinkText: 'Check out details in the pdf.',
  content: 'A research participant shares their experiences and strategies for building healthy financial behaviors.'
}, {
  id: 'dementia-wkshp',
  title: 'Envisioning Dementia Inclusive Futures',
  subtitle: 'A workshop with Elder Care Alliance.',
  problem: 'Elder Care Alliance needed to co-design dementia-inclusive futures with their community',
  method: 'Participatory design workshop, co-creation activities, community engagement',
  solution: 'A community-driven experience roadmap for ECA with actionable dementia-inclusive programming',
  outcome: 'Successful workshop with high engagement, surprise visit from ECA President, actionable roadmap delivered',
  image: '/src/assets/images/dementia-wkshp/dw-cover.jpg',
  imageAlt: 'A photo of a workshop moderator explaining an activity to participants. They are sitting at a table with post-its and sharpies.',
  content: 'Colin Swenson (center) explains the brainstorming activity to participants.'
}, {
  id: '2sided',
  title: 'Ethnography for 2-sided market',
  problem: 'Client is building a 2-sided marketplace platform, but doesn\'t know what will get each community to engage.',
  method: 'Ethnographic interviews, sacrificial concepts, competitive analysis, literature review.',
  solution: 'An insights-based engagement strategy for each community.',
  outcome: 'This project is still underway. We\'ve completed a research phase on one side of the market and are currently conducting research with the other side.',
  image: '/src/assets/images/2sided.png',
  imageAlt: 'an art archivist shows us their work at a local ceramics company',
  externalLink: 'https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dQw4w9WgXcQ',
  externalLinkText: 'Detailed Portfolio piece coming soon :)',
  content: 'An art archivist shows us their work at a local ceramics company.'
}, {
  id: 'crowdfund',
  title: 'Crowdfunding for a community-supported platform.',
  problem: 'The client had an engaged community on their platform, but no revenue model.',
  method: 'Donation psychology literature review, donation trend analysis, and prototyping.',
  solution: 'A new donation UX flow based on what\'s been shown to work.',
  outcome: 'The UX is currently being built, with metrics in place to evaluate its effectiveness once it launches.',
  image: '/src/assets/images/crowdfund.png',
  imageAlt: 'A photo of a research participant writing on an index card with a blue sharpie.',
  externalLink: 'https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dQw4w9WgXcQ',
  externalLinkText: 'Detailed Portfolio piece coming soon :)',
  content: 'A research participant sharing the parts of the client\'s platform they found most valuable. In our trend analysis we learned people are more likely to give right after they experience value. This helped us pin-point places to ask for donations.'
}, {
  id: 'pos',
  title: 'Point-of-sale MVP strategy',
  problem: 'The client is launching a point-of-sale (POS) product in 6 months, and are unsure who they should sell it to and what the experience should be.',
  method: 'Secret shopper, on-the-street interviews, ethnographic interviews, competitive analysis.',
  solution: 'A target-market, MVP, and design strategy.',
  outcome: 'This product has successfully launched!',
  image: '/src/assets/images/pos.jpg',
  imageAlt: 'photo of a small business owner demonstrating how they use their point of sale device.',
  externalLink: 'https://www.dropbox.com/s/ng8apfubttiimeg/1%20-%20POS%20Research%20Sprint.pdf?dl=0',
  externalLinkText: 'Check out details in the pdf.',
  content: 'A small business owner demonstrating how they use their point of sale device.'
}];
export const getProjectById = id => {
  return projects.find(project => project.id === id);
};
